definition: father's sister's husband/husband of paternal aunt/uncle
paternal aunt/husband's sister/husband's mother (old)/nun/for the time being (literary)

sentences.english: Bettys aunt and uncle like the cinema.
sentences.chinese: 貝蒂的姑姑和姑父喜歡去電影院。

sentences.english: He remembered that Xu Huabei's uncle worked at the "A" Committee -was, in fact, a leading cadre there.
sentences.chinese: 他想起徐華北的姑父在A委員會工作，是個領導幹部。

sentences.english: Big on her know the twice to save her that his uncle huang taiji.
sentences.chinese: 大玉兒知道了兩次救她的人就是自己的姑父皇太極。

sentences.english: You've given both your uncle and myself a lot of trouble.
sentences.chinese: 你給你姑父和我都添了麻煩。

sentences.english: She and my uncle had had an argument, and to make up he waited in her customer service line.
sentences.chinese: 她和我姑父吵架了，於是他就在她的客戶裏面排隊。

definition: mother's sister's husband/husband of mother's sister
husband of older female cousin via female line
